title: The Intrepid Girlbot: Unconditional, Volume One
description: It's not easy, living in a big empty house, with sterile hallways and room after room of strange artifacts. Beyond the walls of her home are fields and forests and a Robot City, but nothing quite like her.On her endless quest to be a "good girl" and find her place in the world, she leaves chaos and destruction in her wake.But she means well. Really.Girlbot doesn't have a lot to say, but she wants to be your friend, like it or not.
author: Diana Nock
